description:
Unforunately this is no longer maintained which is a real shame. Unless someone else is willing to take over developement.

Also unforunately as of now it only seems to work on Debian 12 Bookworm. I use the 0.8.0 beta version. Find it a lot more advanced Than the current release. 0.4.0.

This app (the beta one) and GDM Settings are 2 must have customizing have to haves.
its just so good, its so easy to use, and its so customisable and it makes a big difference too and its so cool

The description of this app really should mention these additional steps. 
https://github.com/GradienceTeam/Gradience
If you look at the repo (link above) they describe enabling flatpak app theming. Simple override in the gradience app preference (or adding certain folders to the file system access for all files using flatseal).
summary: FLatpak apps work with extra steps

description: Gradience works as expected and is great for theming. Just works out of the box. Although for most applications to respect your theming choices you'll have to logout and login. I wish this was told to be when I applied the theme as this caused some confusion. Plus some flatpak apps simply don't respect the theme what so ever. But so far everything is great and easy to use.
this app makes every other app look so nice and give me so much flexibility and freedom with themeing, absolutely reccomend
summary: my favourite app of all time

description: Yeah I got to do some setup but I really like the pretty purple theme
summary: I get to theme gnome with this

description: It makes my apps very consistent.
works on kde also, for themeing my apps that use libadwaita

Fedora 38 and this app DOES NOTHING
@DEV : get a life

I made my own favorite gnome coloring/theming with this app. its pretty awesome. When applying the theme for flatpaks and gtk3 apps, the toggle goes into weird state and sometimes doesnt work. Trying it a few times, logging in and out made it work somehow. So, overall love the app!

Prior to Gnome 45 Gradience worked like a dream.
After upgrading theming for GTK4 native apps does not apply consistently. I hope this will be corrected soon.
summary: Overall? Wonderful. But Gnome 45 breaks app

description: never had any issues, hope this becomes integrated into gnome
it has set my theme to a weird white one after i have applied a dark one and now i cannot reset it
I am totally frustrated, I can't set it back to default........ hell there is no any solution I need to re-install my entire OS again.
summary: Can't set it back to Default theme

description: i mean, user want to choose the theme for dark mode and light mode, when you using this app you override the both, the authors must do the option for dark and light theme, then the app will be fully ready
summary: Good idea but lack of basic functionality

description: Finally no more broken apps because of GTK3-Theming. This app allows you to truly theme your GTK4 programms while still keeping them gorgeous and perfecty useable. I still recommend caution though because you can still break readability by setting up poor contrast
summary: Theme your GTK-Apps the right way

description: Gradience is an amazing tool for customizing Adwaita at your own taste, if you like existing color palettes you can download pre-configured themes directly from Gradience!
summary: Theming Adwaita was never that easy
